TopicTitle: Anyone think Pewdiepie should play KSP?

Articles.Content: Does anyone think Pewds should play KSP?I want your opinion on this.

I would like to see him play it,

but he doesn't seem like the guy who would play simulation games.
I'd love to see him play it, but he doesn't seem to like games that require dedication and learning.

Does anyone think Pewds should play KSP?I want your opinion on this.

Pewdiepie is a pussy. Stop being watching a pussy and watch a real man like Robbaz

Pewdiepie is a pussy.

He's not a pussy. Pewdipie, Toby AND Robbaz are funny as hell.

Just because you don't like someone means they're a pussy. I like him, but he probably won't play KSP unless other big Youtubers start it (Which WILL happen). And besides, this game doesn't require learning. You can mess around all you want

But he probably won't play KSP unless other big Youtubers start it (Which WILL happen).

Robbaz plays KSP. That's something.
I mean a LOT of other Youtubers. Not just a handful.
I really don't like pewdipie that much.
........NO.
No.Just no.
Kerbal space program is not something you can do a funny commentary on and there are no vocals so pewdiepie just couldn't do it
God no, Pewdiepie is a moron that gets his views from kids by screaming "RAPE" into a mic over some scary games in some ridiculous forced accent.

........NO.

I second this. I will probably have to throw my computer into the pool and burn it if this happened.

Gee I would love to see a guy whose main shtick is to yell and scream random obscenities play a game which requires thought, planning, and concentration.

The influx of his entire awful fanbase would not be a detriment to KSP at all. Nothing could possibly go wrong.

........NO.

I was going to say this to, but I tried to be nice about it. I guess not. I think it would totally ruin KSP if he did.
If he played it then we would have so many 5 year old trolls on these forums. No offense to people here who like him.
He won't ruin KSP, but I don't think he's this kind of gamer. You know, KSP isn't an "Action packed" game. You have to learn orbital mechanics to do stuff here.

He is a gamer, but he's not good at it.

You don't have to be weird to be funny while commentating over a game.

Kerbal space program is not something you can do a funny commentary on

I beg to differ.
No. For the love of all that is good NO.
No but he could play with traffic for all I care.

ONNOOOOOOOOOOONOOOOOOOONNOONNOOOOOOO
ONONOOOOOOOOOONOOOOOOONOOOOOONOOOOOO

ONOOOOOOOOONOONOOOOOONOOOOOOOONOOOOO
ONOOOOOOOOOONONOOOOOOONOOOOOONOOOOOO
ONOOOOOOOOOOONNOOOOOOOONNOONNOOOOOOO
ONOOOOOOOOOOOONOOOOOOOOOONNOOOOOOOOO

Just, no.

No.

I really think that it would be fine if he PLAYED KSP, but not if all of his fans came and decimated the forums.

You don't need to be a rocket scientist to play this game, or even a Mcdonald's worker.

I think it would be entertaining to see him absolutely fail miserably, but that's too small a gift for having the forum's trashed.

No.

I really think that it would be fine if he PLAYED KSP, but not if all of his fans came and decimated the forums.

You don't need to be a rocket scientist to play this game, or even a Mcdonald's worker.

I think it would be entertaining to see him absolutely fail miserably, but that's too small a gift for having the forum's trashed.

How about the week he starts playing it, we tear down the forums and have a secret one, then when he decides it is to hard we can put it back up
